Package free.chess

A chess framework (classes Position, Move...) and chess related swing components (JBoard, JChessClock).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BoardPainter An interface for classes who paint the board image on the Board component to implement.
ColoredBoardPainter An extension of the BoardPainter interface which allows setting and retrieving the colors with which the SQUARES are drawn.
ColoredPiecePainter An extension of the PiecePainter interface which adds methods that allow retrieving and modifying the color of the painted pieces.
PiecePainter An interface classes that know how to paint chess pieces should implement.
WildVariant An interface classes defining rules for wild chess variants must implement.
 

Class Summary
AbstractChessClock The abstract superclass of all components who display a chess clock (one part of it).
Chess An implementation of WildVariant for the game of chess (classic).
ChesslikeGenericVariant Implements WildVariant for chesslike variants.
ChessMove An extension of the Move class for variants which have rules similar to regular chess.
ChessPiece Represents a "soldier" in the game of chess - a chess piece.
DefaultBoardPainter The default BoardPainter implementation used by JBoard.
DefaultPiecePainter The default PiecePainter implementation used in JBoard.
ImageBoardPainter An implementation of BoardPainter which uses an Image, or two images (one for light SQUARES and one for dark) to draw the board.
ImagePiecePainter An implementation of PiecePainter which paints images.
JBoard An implementation of a chess board component.
JChessClock A Component for displaying a simple, text based chess clock.
Move This is the superclass of move implementations for various wild chess variants.
Piece The superclass of all classes representing pieces in wild chess variants.
PieceChooser A dialog which lets the user choose a Piece from the given set of pieces.
PieceIcon  
PlainBoardPainter An implementation of BoardPainter which fills the SQUARES with colors.
Player Defines two constants, one for the player with the white pieces and one for the player with the black pieces.
Position Represents a position in one of the chess wild variants.
Position.Modifier Instances of this class is allowed to make modifications to a Position without triggering the Position instance to fire any events.
Square Represents a location on a chess board.
VectorPiecePainter An abstract class offering a convenient partial implementation for vector based piece sets.
 

Exception Summary
MoveFormatException Thrown when the format of a chess move is wrong.
PositionFormatException Thrown when the format of a chess Position is wrong.
SquareFormatException Thrown when the format of a chess Square is wrong.
 

Package free.chess Description

A chess framework (classes Position, Move...) and chess related swing components (JBoard, JChessClock).
